lines: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo
rnam dkar dge la 'dun pa'i gru chen gyis
rnam mang grub mtha' rgya mtsho'i mthar son nas
rnam grol nor bu'i dpal 'byor stsol mdzad pa
rnam 'dren ded dpon bzang po rgyal gyur cig
dge tshogs mu med kyis bskrun sku
'dun ldan yid kyi re skong gsung
grub mchog bdud rtsi'i dpal ldan thugs
bzang po'i phrin las can der 'dud
thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol son
rtogs pa yid bzhin nor bu brnyes
'gro mang dge la 'dun mdzad pa'i
don gnyis lhun grub la phyag 'tshal
sku bltams bstan la rab tu byung
mkhas btsun bzang gsum zhabs la gtugs
sdom pa gsum gyi khrims dang ldan
sde snod gsum la sbyangs pa mdzad
'chad rtsod rtsom pa'i spobs pa thob
chos brgyad mgo snyoms 'brom rje bzhin
sku mched gsum gyi rnam thar bskyangs
lung bstan ngo mtshar sna tshogs brnyes
thub bstan 'ba' zhig gces par bzungs
skal ldan slob ma'i 'khor tshogs rgyas
zhi ba'i dbyings su gshegs pa ste
ngo mtshar mdzad pa bcu gnyis so
shes rab mchog gis bag yod legs bsrungs pas
skal bzang khyod la don dang bcas par gyur
bde gshegs bstan la nyes ltung dri mas dben
de slad ngur smrig 'dzin pa'i mchog tu gyur
pa wa sangs ltar dkar ba'i brtse sems can
pha ma 'di kun 'khor bar 'khyams pa la
ba spu g.yo 'gul med pa mi rung bas
ma lus 'gro ba'i don du byang chub sgrubs
phyogs glang grags pa'i gsung rab nam mkha' las
legs par 'thon pa'i grub mtha' nam mkha'i lcags
rigs pa'i klog 'phreng stong dang bcas pa des
phas rgol lha min sde dang bcas pa 'dar
'jam dbyangs gsung gi 'dab bzang me tog la
stong nyid sbrang rtsi zab mo'i bcud chags pa
khyod kyi rnam dpyod ro 'dzin dam pa des
bsten pas zab lam bdud rtsi'i dga' ston myong
gsung rab dal gyis 'chad pa'i smra mkhas dang
log smra phyi rgol sbobs pa 'phrog byed pas
mkhas pa'i mdun sar rtsod pa'i khril dbang
gsung rab dgongs don tshul bzhin rab 'byed pa'i
sdeb legs rtsom pas mkhas rnams dga' ba skyed
rmad byung mkhas pa'i bya ba gsum po 'di
'jig rten 'di na mun sel sgron me yin
rmongs pa'i mun sel rgya chen thos pa dang
rigs lam ma 'dres 'byed pa'i so sor rtog
gnas lugs don la lta ba'i nyams len gsum
'dzam gling 'di na 'dod pa 'jo ba yin
thos pa rgya mtsho'i btung bas mi ngoms shing
bsam pa yid kyi ri mo ci yang shes
sgom byung rtogs pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod
snyan pa'i grags pa srid rtse'i bar du g.yo
nyon mongs gdung sel nges 'byung tshul khrims dang
dpag yas 'gro la brtse ba'i lhag bsam dang
mthar 'dzin dra ba gcod pa'i shes rab ste
sa steng 'di na rin chen rnam pa gsum
'jig rten mkhyen ba rnyed dang ma rnyed dang
bde dang mi bde snyan dang mi snyan dang
bstod smad ces bgyi 'jig rten chos brgyad po
bdag gi yid yul min par mgo snyoms mdzod
gzhan dang rtsod pa tsam la mi chags shing
tshig gi lbu bas nam yang mi ngoms par
thos pa'i don rnams nyams su blangs pa las
rgyal ba dgyes pa'i lam la 'jug par 'gyur
bdag ni rgyal ba kun gyi bstan pa la
gzhon nu'i dus su rab byung thob gyur te
'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu lung bstan nas
bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin la brtson par shog
dka' bcu pa kun dga' don grub
dka' bcu pa shes rab dpal
dka' bcu ba tshul khrims bzang po
dka' bcu pa don grub dpal
dka' bcu pa ye shes bzang po
bshes gnyen grags pa bsam grub
spong ba pa 'jam dpal grags pa
btsun pa rgyal ba bsam grub
dang por khyim gyi bya ba btang
bar du chos brgyad zhen pa ldog
tha mar zhi bde phyogs gcig spangs
khyod ni skyes bu chen po lags
dang por thos la nan tan han mdzad
bar du bsam pa'i klong rdol zhing
tha mar sgom byung rtogs pa brnyes
bcas pa'i mtshams las mi 'da' ba
khyod ni gnas brtan chen po lags
lhag pa'i bsam pas rgyud sbyangs shing
smon dang 'jug pa'i khrims dang ldan
rtag tu gzhan gyi don bsam pa
rgyal sras sems dpa' chen po khyod
dbang gis thugs smin dam tshig ldan
bskyed rim lha yi rnal 'byor brtan
lhan skyes rdo rje'i thugs mnga' ba
rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rje
dang por rig gnas thun mong bslabs
bar du sde snod gsum la sbyangs
tha mar rgyud sde mtha' dag mkhyen
thams cad mkhyen pa'ang don dang mthun
bar du blo ldan tshogs pa skyangs
tha mar mchog gsum lhun gyis grub
gzhan don 'phrin las chen po'ang khyod
blang dor phra mo'ang thugs su chud
nyes ltung shin tu phra la 'dzem
g.yo sgyu phra mo dag la 'dzem
khyod ni mkhas btsun bzang po lags
'chad tshe snying gi mun pa sel
rtsod pas pha rol spobs pa 'phrog
snyan ngag rtsom la thogs med khyod
mkhas pa'i bya ba gsum dang ldan
de ltar rje btsun bla ma thugs rje can
yon tan kun gyi phung po mtha' med ba
de yi rnam thar rmad byung rgya mtsho las
po mtshar mdzad pa bcu gnyis chu thigs 'di
skyes mchog gang de'i thugs rje'i spyan ras kyis
cung zad btsas pa'i dge slong spong ba pa
phul byung dga' bas sgro skur rab spangs te
rang gzhan dad pa'i rten du yi ger bkod
'di yi dge bas tshe rabs kun tu bdag
rje btson khyod nyid mnyes pa'i mthu dag gis
mdo sngags rgyal ba'i chos tshul mtha' dag kun
ma lus 'gro ba'i don du 'dzin gyur cig
